Collection.name: Buyers Guide

Addon.name: Buyers Guide
Addon.Help:
This add-on is a self contained system for selling banner ads and priority placements within the Supplier directory categories.  To use this function create a page that will "house" the add-on and simply drop it on the content page.  The various settings for categories and placement records can be found in the admin area under manage add-ons supplier directory in the following buckets.

Directory Banner Ads (ca) - These are the banner ad records that will display in the directory
Directory Placements (ca) - These are the organizational placements records that place companies within categories and priority placements
Directory Showcase Ads (ca)- These are the Shocase ads that appear on the site within the product showcase
Directory Subcategories (ca) - these are the category and sub category records where you can edit/add/delete
Organization Subcategories (ca) - These are the records that tie organizations to placement categories/sub-categories

Scripting.Code: function m dim sql sql = "update organizations" _ & " set" _ & " directoryName=name" _ & ",directoryaddress1=address1" _ & ",directoryaddress2=address2" _ & ",directorycity=city" _ & ",directorystate=state" _ & ",directorycountry=country" _ & ",directoryzip=zip" _ & ",directoryphone=phone" _ & ",directoryfax=fax" _ & ",directoryweb=web" _ & ",directoryemail=email" _ & ",directorylink=link" _ & ",directoryprofileImageFilename=profileImageFilename" _ & ",directorylistingImageFilename=listingImageFilename" _ & ",directoryisAssociationMember=isAssociationMember" _ & ",directoryisExhibitor=isExhibitor" _ & ",directoryisEnhancedListing=isEnhancedListing" _ & ",directoryprofileDescription=profileDescription" _ & ",directoryprofileContact=profileContact" _ & ",directoryaccountContactId=accountContactId" _ & ",directoryprofileApprovedByAccount=profileApprovedByAccount" _ & ",directoryInitialized=1" _ & " where (directoryInitialized is null)or(directoryInitialized=0)" call cp.db.executeSql( sql ) end function

Addon.name: Supplier Directory Settings
Addon.Help: This add-on allows you to modify certain attributes of the directory that are editable.  For a list click on the "Supplier Directory Settings" link in the admin area under manage add-ons, supplier directory.
Addon.FormXML: <form> <tab name="Details"> <siteproperty name="SUPPLIER DIRECTORY MEMBER LINK">/</siteproperty> <siteproperty name="SUPPLIER DIRECTORY MEMBER COMPANY CAPTION">Member Company</siteproperty> <siteproperty name="SUPPLIER DIRECTORY MEMBER COMPANY LINK">/</siteproperty> <siteproperty name="SUPPLIER DIRECTORY EXHIBITOR CAPTION">Exhibitor</siteproperty> <siteproperty name="SUPPLIER DIRECTORY EXHIBITOR LINK">/</siteproperty> <siteproperty name="SUPPLIER DIRECTORY SHOWCASE CAPTION">Product Showcase</siteproperty> <siteproperty name="SUPPLIER DIRECTORY TEST MODE" type="boolean">true</siteproperty> <siteproperty name="SUPPLIER DIRECTORY TEST EMAIL ADDRESS">support@contensive.com</siteproperty> <siteproperty name=""></siteproperty> <siteproperty name=""></siteproperty> </tab> </form>

Addon.name: Supplier Directory Vanity URL Processor
Addon.Help: Creates a vanity URL for each enhanced listing

Scripting.Code:
function getContent()
dim cs dim csA dim aliasName dim aliasPrefix dim pageID
set cs = cp.csNew() set csA = cp.csNew() aliasPrefix = cp.site.GetProperty("Supplier Directory Vanity URL Prefix") pageID = cp.site.GetProperty("Supplier Directory Location")
if cs.Open("Organizations", "(includeInDirectory=1) and (directoryIsEnhancedListing=1)",,,"id,name") then do while cs.OK() aliasName = aliasPrefix & "/" & cs.GetText("name") aliasName = replace(aliasName, "'", "-") aliasName = replace(aliasName, """", "-") aliasName = replace(aliasName, " ", "-") aliasName = replace(aliasName, "&", "-") aliasName = replace(aliasName, "=", "-") aliasName = replace(aliasName, "?", "-") aliasName = replace(aliasName, "+", "-") ' call csA.Open("Link Aliases", "name=" & cp.db.encodeSQLText(aliasName)) if not csA.OK() then csA.Close() call csA.Insert("Link Aliases") end if if csA.OK() then call csA.SetField("name", aliasName) call csA.SetField("PageID", pageID) call csA.SetField("QueryStringSuffix", "formId=4&organizationid=" & cs.GetInteger("ID")) end if csA.Close() ' call cs.GoNext() loop end if call cs.Close()
end function

Addon.name: Supplier Directory, Banner Ad Review Notification Email Process

Scripting.Code: function go exit function Dim emailCnt Dim adId Dim adName Dim cs Dim csEmail Dim emailBody Dim emailToId Dim emailFromAddress Dim emailSubject Dim emailContactMemberId Dim adOrganizationId Dim csOrg Dim errorMessage ' EmailCnt = cp.utils.encodeInteger( cp.site.getProperty( "reviewemail-cnt" )) call cp.site.setProperty( "reviewemail-cnt", (emailCnt+1)) set cs = cp.csnew call cs.open( "Directory Banner Ads", "(SendReviewRequest<>0)" ) do while cs.ok emailId = cs.getInteger( "ReviewEmailID" ) if emailId<>0 then adId = cs.getInteger( "id" ) adName = cs.getText( "name" ) adOrganizationId = cs.getInteger( "OrganizationId" ) emailToId = 0 ' set csOrg = cp.csnew call csOrg.Open( "organizations", "id=" & adOrganizationId ) if Not csOrg.ok then errorMessage = errorMessage & vbcrlf & "Banner Ad #" & adId & ", '" & adName & "' can not send notification email because it does not have a valid organization." else emailToId = csOrg.getInteger( "AccountContactID" ) end if call csOrg.close() ' set csEmail = cp.csnew call csEmail.open( "system Email", "id=" & emailID ) if not csEmail.ok then errorMessage = errorMessage & vbcrlf & "Banner Ad #" & adId & ", '" & adName & "' can not send notification email because it does not have a valid system email." else emailBody = csEmail.getText( "CopyFilename" ) emailBody = replace( emailCopy, "##name##", adName ) emailTextMemberId = cs.getInteger( "TestMemberID" ) emailSubject = cs.getText( "subject" ) emailFromAddress = cs.getText( "fromAddress" ) call cp.email.sendUser( emailToId, emailFrom, emailSubject, emailBody ) end if call csEmail.close call cp.site.setProperty( "reviewemail-id", emailId) end if call cs.setField( "sendReviewRequest", 0 ) call cs.goNext loop call cs.close end function

Addon.name: BuyersGuidejs
Old Supplier Directory
Addon.Help:
This add-on is a self contained system for selling banner ads and priority placements within the Supplier directory categories.  To use this function create a page that will "house" the add-on and simply drop it on the content page.  The various settings for categories and placement records can be found in the admin area under manage add-ons supplier directory in the following buckets.

Directory Banner Ads (ca) - These are the banner ad records that will display in the directory
Directory Placements (ca) - These are the organizational placements records that place companies within categories and priority placements
Directory Showcase Ads (ca)- These are the Shocase ads that appear on the site within the product showcase
Directory Subcategories (ca) - these are the category and sub category records where you can edit/add/delete
Organization Subcategories (ca) - These are the records that tie organizations to placement categories/sub-categories

Field.Name: Name
Field.Caption: Name
Field.HelpDefault: A name you give for this placement.

Field.Name: Active
Field.Caption: Active
Field.HelpDefault: Check to make this Placement available for the directory.

Field.Name: Priority
Field.Caption: Priority
Field.HelpDefault: An integer used to prioritize the directory listings within a directory subcategory. The lower the number, the higher the priority this placement is given.

Field.Name: Name
Field.Caption: Name
Field.HelpDefault: The name you give this record. This does not appear online.

Field.Name: Approved
Field.Caption: Approved by Directory
Field.HelpDefault: Checked by the directory administrator when the ad is approved.

Field.Name: OrganizationID
Field.Caption: Organization
Field.HelpDefault: The organization for which this showcase add belongs.

Field.Name: ImageFilename
Field.Caption: Showcase Image
Field.HelpDefault: The image for the ad. It should be 000px wide and 000px tall.

Field.Name: Caption
Field.Caption: Listing Caption
Field.HelpDefault: The caption for the ad.

Field.Name: Copy
Field.Caption: Showcase Copy
Field.HelpDefault: The copy that appears below the image in the showcase ad.

Field.Name: Link
Field.Caption: Link
Field.HelpDefault: When this ad is clicked, this is where the visitor is directed.

Field.Name: DateExpires
Field.Caption: Date Expires
Field.HelpDefault: The last date when this ad appears on the site. It will not appear the next day.

Field.Name: ApprovedByAccount
Field.Caption: Approved by Account Contact
Field.HelpDefault: Checked by the account contact in the online profile screen when they approved the ad.

Field.Name: parentId
Field.Caption: Parent Organization
Field.HelpDefault: Parent Organization is used by Membership Manager to track sub-organizations. If an organization as a parent organization, it's employees can be given membership benefits on the site.

Field.Name: profileUpdateNotificationDate
Field.Caption: Profile Update Notification Date
Field.HelpDefault: (internal use - do not use)

Field.Name: MemberType
Field.Caption: Member Type

Field.Name: TCAID
Field.Caption: TCAID

Field.Name: JoinDate
Field.Caption: Join Date

Field.Name: Recruiter
Field.Caption: Recruiter

Field.Name: RecruiterCompany
Field.Caption: Recruiter Company

Field.Name: Revenue
Field.Caption: Revenue

Field.Name: Touched
Field.Caption: Sync Status (Touched)

Field.Name: ExpDate
Field.Caption: Expiration Date

Field.Name: Source
Field.Caption: Source

Field.Name: LegacyAccountID
Field.Caption: LegacyAccountID
Field.HelpDefault: (not used)

Field.Name: IsExhibitor
Field.Caption: x IsExhibitor
Field.HelpDefault: When checked, the organizations listing includes the Exhibitor Tag. This tag is set in the Supplier Directory Settings page.

Field.Name: IsEnhancedListing
Field.Caption: x Is Enhanced Listing
Field.HelpDefault: When checked, the listing includes enhanced options.

Field.Name: ListingImageFilename
Field.Caption: x Listing Image
Field.HelpDefault: The image displayed on the left side of enhanced listings.

Field.Name: ProfileImageFilename
Field.Caption: x Profile Image
Field.HelpDefault: This image is displayed at the top of the profile page for enhanced listings

Field.Name: ProfileDescription
Field.Caption: x Profile Description
Field.HelpDefault: This copy is displayed on the organizations profile page.

Field.Name: IsAssociationMember
Field.Caption: x Is Association Member
Field.HelpDefault: When checked, the organizations listing includes the Association Listing Tag. This tag is set in the Supplier Directory Settings page.

Field.Name: ProfileContact
Field.Caption: x Profile Contact
Field.HelpDefault: The contact listed on the profile page

Field.Name: AccountContactID
Field.Caption: x Account Contact
Field.HelpDefault: This is the contact at the organization who handles the Supplier Directory. They must be in the Account Contacts group to appear in this list.

Field.Name: profileApprovedByAccount
Field.Caption: x Profile Approved By Account
Field.HelpDefault: When checked, the profile has been approved by the organization. This checkbox is available in their My Account page and must be checked for the profile page to be available.

Field.Name: directoryName
Field.Caption: Name
Field.HelpDefault: Displayed in the supplier directory.

Field.Name: directoryAddress1
Field.Caption: Address Line 1
Field.HelpDefault: Displayed in the supplier directory.

Field.Caption: Address Line 2
Field.HelpDefault: Displayed in the supplier directory.

Field.HelpDefault: Displayed in the supplier directory.

Field.HelpDefault: Displayed in the supplier directory.

Field.Name: directoryCountry
Field.Caption: Country
Field.HelpDefault: Displayed in the supplier directory.

Field.Name: directoryZip
Field.Caption: Zip
Field.HelpDefault: Displayed in the supplier directory.

Field.Name: directoryPhone
Field.Caption: Phone
Field.HelpDefault: Displayed in the supplier directory.

Field.Name: directoryFax
Field.Caption: Fax
Field.HelpDefault: Displayed in the supplier directory.

Field.Name: directoryWeb
Field.Caption: Web
Field.HelpDefault: Displayed in the supplier directory.

Field.Name: directoryEmail
Field.Caption: Email
Field.HelpDefault: Displayed in the supplier directory.

Field.Name: directoryLink
Field.Caption: Link
Field.HelpDefault: Displayed in the supplier directory. if you want clicks to the Web field to go to another address, enter it here.

Field.Name: directoryIsExhibitor
Field.Caption: IsExhibitor
Field.HelpDefault: When checked, the organizations listing includes the Exhibitor Tag. This tag is set in the Supplier Directory Settings page.

Field.Name: directoryIsEnhancedListing
Field.Caption: Is Enhanced Listing
Field.HelpDefault: When checked, the listing includes enhanced options.

Field.Name: directoryListingImageFilename
Field.Caption: Listing Image (120px x 60px)
Field.HelpDefault: The image displayed on the left side of enhanced listings.

Field.Name: directoryProfileImageFilename
Field.Caption: Profile Image (300px x 150px)
Field.HelpDefault: This image is displayed at the top of the profile page for enhanced listings

Field.Name: directoryProfileDescription
Field.Caption: Profile Description
Field.HelpDefault: This copy is displayed on the organizations profile page.

Field.Name: directoryIsAssociationMember
Field.Caption: Is Association Member
Field.HelpDefault: When checked, the organizations listing includes the Association Listing Tag. This tag is set in the Supplier Directory Settings page.

Field.Name: directoryProfileContact
Field.Caption: Profile Contact
Field.HelpDefault: The contact listed on the profile page

Field.Name: directoryAccountContactID
Field.Caption: Account Contact
Field.HelpDefault: This is the contact at the organization who handles the Supplier Directory. They must be in the Account Contacts group to appear in this list.

Field.Name: directoryprofileApprovedByAccount
Field.Caption: Profile Approved By Account
Field.HelpDefault: When checked, the profile has been approved by the organization. This checkbox is available in their My Account page and must be checked for the profile page to be available.

Field.Name: directoryInitialized
Field.Caption: Directory Fields Initialized
Field.HelpDefault: Uncheck to allow the system to copy data from the details tab into the Directory tab. This will Over-write the data in the directory tab.

Field.Name: includeInDirectory
Field.Caption: Include in Directory
Field.HelpDefault: When checked, this organization is included in the supplier directory.

Field.Name: dateDeletedBySync
Field.Caption: Date Inactivated by Sync
Field.HelpDefault: (internal use - do not use)

Field.Name: tcaMemberType
Field.Caption: TCA Member Type
Field.HelpDefault: (internal use - do not use) Determine membership type in Membership Manager, or in the Account record.

Field.Name: memberMaxSyncStatus
Field.Caption: Sync Status
Field.HelpDefault: (internal use) The status of this organization's synchonization with MemberMax

Field.Name: memberMaxDateDeleted
Field.Caption: Date Deleted
Field.HelpDefault: The date this organization no longer appeared on MemberMax.

Field.Name: memberMaxMemberNo
Field.Caption: Member No
Field.HelpDefault: The member number populated by the MemberMax Sync.

Field.Name: memberMaxMemberType
Field.Caption: Member Type
Field.HelpDefault: The member type populated by the MemberMax Sync. Found to be one of [Fleet Operator, Association, Public Sector, Not A Member, Honorary, Associate]

Field.Name: taxi
Field.Caption: Taxi
Field.HelpDefault: Checked if in the Taxi Division. Populated by the Membermax Sync.

Field.Name: limo
Field.Caption: Limo
Field.HelpDefault: Checked if in the Limo Division. Populated by the Membermax Sync.

Field.Name: paratransit
Field.Caption: Paratransit
Field.HelpDefault: Checked if in the Paratransit Division. Populated by the Membermax Sync.

Field.Name: logo
Field.Caption: Company Logo
Field.HelpDefault: Company Logo. TLPA Member Search and Find-A-Ride automatically creates a link to the images stored on Membermax.

Field.Name: memberMaxCompanyId
Field.Caption: Company Id
Field.HelpDefault: The MemberMax company Id populated by the sync.

Field.Name: phone2
Field.Caption: Toll Free Phone

Field.Name: taxiCnt
Field.Caption: Taxi Count
Field.HelpDefault: The number of taxi vehicles operated by this member.

Field.Name: limoCnt
Field.Caption: Limo Count
Field.HelpDefault: The number of limo vehicles operated by this member.

Field.Name: paratransitCnt
Field.Caption: Paratransit Count
Field.HelpDefault: The number of paratransit vehicles operated by this member.

Field.Name: memberMaxHasLogo
Field.Caption: Has Logo Image
Field.HelpDefault: This box is checked by the housekeep process when it detect that MemberMax has a corporate logo for this member. if checked, the Members carousel on the home page includes the logo.

Field.Name: latitude
Field.Caption: Latitude
Field.HelpDefault: Latitude of the organizations Location

Field.Name: longitude
Field.Caption: Longitude
Field.HelpDefault: Longitude of the organizations Location

Field.Name: Name
Field.Caption: Name
Field.HelpDefault: The subcategory name. For example if you have a subcategory Accounting under the Business category, enter Accounting as the Name and Business as the Category.

Field.Name: Active
Field.Caption: Active
Field.HelpDefault: Uncheck to disable this subcategory.

Field.Name: Name
Field.Caption: Name
Field.HelpDefault: A name for the ad. This is not visible to the public or the account.

Field.Name: OrganizationID
Field.Caption: Organization
Field.HelpDefault: The organization whose account will be billed for this ad.

Field.Name: Link
Field.Caption: Link
Field.HelpDefault: The URL where a visitor will be taken if they click on the ad

Field.Name: ImageFilename
Field.Caption: Image
Field.HelpDefault: The image to be displayed for this banner ad.

Field.Name: TypeID
Field.Caption: Type
Field.HelpDefault: The physical size of the ad to display

Field.Name: Approved
Field.Caption: Approved by Directory
Field.HelpDefault: Approve this ad when billing has been approved. It will only display when this is checked and when the account contact review the ad and checks Approved By Account on their Account page.

Field.Name: Title
Field.Caption: Image Title
Field.HelpDefault: The title used for the banner ad when a visitor mouses over it.

Field.Name: ApprovedByAccount
Field.Caption: Approved by Account Contact
Field.HelpDefault: This checkbox appears on the account edit page. The ad will run only when both this and Approved by Account have both been checked.

Field.Name: DateExpires
Field.Caption: Date Expires
Field.HelpDefault: Set to the date when this ad should no longer appear. Leave it blank to run the ad without interruption.

Field.Name: SendReviewRequest
Field.Caption: Send Review Request Email
Field.HelpDefault: When checked, the system will send the email selected in the Review Request Email list to the account contact for this organization. This Ads name will be replaced into the email everywhere the text ##name## is found.

Field.Name: ReviewEmailID
Field.Caption: Review Request Email
Field.HelpDefault: See Send Review Request Email for details
